body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Andrew Rogers and the customer's name is Linda Williams.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Andrew Rogers, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Andrew, I'm Linda Williams. I'm just looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Linda! We have a great selection of motorcycles. What type of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm thinking about getting a cruiser. I like the classic style.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Cruisers are a fantastic choice! They offer comfort and style. Do you have a particular budget in mind?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was hoping to stay around ten thousand dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds reasonable! May I also ask how long you've been riding motorcycles?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been riding for about five years now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great experience! Lastly, could you provide me with your phone number for further updates? Just the area code first, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Linda! And what about your email address for sending you information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's l.williams at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Linda! I will make sure to send you all the relevant details. Is there anything else you'd like to ask?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, Linda. Have a wonderful day, and I look forward to assisting you further!
